name: UserStyles - Sticky Top Bar and Search Form
description: Sticks the top bar and search form to the top and the admin contact button to the bottom. Also gives an option to fit with the UserStyles Full width style by strel. (If you use this style, it has to be yes, else it'll look strange...). If you chosed to hide the ads, do not use any ad remover/blocker for UserStyles, it will break. Works only for the large screen display version (Not the version for phone).
